paper.title: Abstract View Objects for Multiple OODB Integration
paper.venue: Proceedings of the First JSSST International Symposium on Object Technologies for Advanced Software
paper.abstract: The notion of Abstract View Object (AVO) is introduced to support abstract representations of foreign or integrated objects in a multidatabase environment. This approach allows OODBs to be cooperated without physical integration, underlies a consistent universal object identification mechanism, and provides an intuitive settheoretic foundation for linking object identification, object integration and function inheritance semantically over multidatabases.
